CustomField.defaultValue: IF( CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name , "Industrial"), 15, IF( OR( CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name , "ENT"), CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name , "Major")), 90, IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name, "AE3"), 60, 30)))
CustomField.description: Length of trial in days, as per Free Trial Agreement
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Default period of 30 days for Inside sales + partner managers, 60 days for Major Accounts, 15 days for Industrial
CustomField.label: Trial Period (in days)
